name: phase-1-final-project
description: ## Description: The MusicBrainz application gives a list of various artist as well as their basic information such as:  1. The name of the artist. 2. The music genre that the artist's songs are based on. 3. An image of the artist. 4. A small biography on the artist. 5. Some of the artist's top hits. This application also allows users to search their favourite artists and get some basic information about them.
